content.question: The radius r of a sphere is increasing at a constant rate of 0.04 centimeters per second. (Note: The volume of a sphere with radius r is V = 4/3πr3.) (a) At the time when the radius of the sphere is 10 centimeters, what is the rate of increase of its volume?
